title: Fremont Single Family Home in desired area now available!
posting_body: Lease Terms-1 Year Lease, No smoking, Cat or small dog ok.
Properties can't be rented sight unseen.
Once you've seen the property and would like to move forward with application process, you'll be able to do so through our website
<URL>, click available Homes for rent, click Fremont office, click Fremont, click apply now on Litchfield Ave.
This 3 bedroom 2.5 bath single family home has a ton of nice attractive features for any renter.
This home has been nice clean painting, and is super clean throughout home.
The following appliances come with this beautiful home, including, refrigerator, dishwasher, oven/stove, washer/dryer.
In this place, all 3 bedrooms are spacious, as well as both bathrooms.
There's also an additional room added onto the home passed the dining area.
There is a 2 car garage that is attached to the home and a nice playground/park for kids right up the street in central park and lake Elizabeth.
There's a fenced private back yard with a nice little garden & patio.
Gardening is included with the property.
This Home is located next to a ton of things.
Seconds away from Fremont BART, Central Park, Fremont Main Library, Fremont Hub, and tons more.
Please give me a call to set up a viewing.
